title: Rescue the Grand Duke
content:
ntinue onward with Wyll. Counsellor Florrick or Cordula Eltan will later ambush the party, while accusing Wyll of killing the father so he could take the city. Note: Before you make your choice, if the Duke does not need to be ressurected, it is possible to break the pact and later on find a way to save his father if you find him alive at the Iron Throne.

Your response here will determine his choice.

What will happen to Wyll's powers if he breaks the pact? Save your father, Wyll. The city will
